summary: "Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows – Part 1" is a 2010 fantasy movie directed by David Yates. It's based on J.K. Rowling's novel and is the seventh Harry Potter movie. Harry (Daniel Radcliffe) is asked by Dumbledore to find and destroy Lord Voldemort's Horcruxes, the key to his immortality. The film also stars Rupert Grint and Emma Watson as Ron and Hermione. It was well-received and made a lot of money, becoming one of the highest-grossing films of 2010. The story continues in the next movie, "Part 2."
title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows – Part 1
